verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

You, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> to the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> An end: <S%H7093><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> on the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H3671><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

Now is the end <S%H7093><s%> on you, <S%H7971><s%> and I will send my anger <S%H639><s%> on you, <S%H8199><s%> and will judge you according to your ways; <S%H1870><s%> and I will bring <S%H5414><s%> on you all your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

My eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare <S%H2347><s%> you, <S%H2550><s%> neither will I have pity; but I will bring <S%H5414><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%> on you, <S%H8441><s%> and your abominations shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you: <S%H3045><s%> and you shall know that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> An evil, <S%H7451><s%> an only <S%H259><s%> evil; <S%H7451><s%> behold, <S%H935><s%> it comes.
An end <S%H7093><s%> has come, <S%H935><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> has come; <S%H935><s%> it awakes <S%H6974><s%> against you; <S%H935><s%> behold, it comes.

Your doom <S%H6843><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> to you, <S%H3427><s%> inhabitant of the land: <S%H776><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> has come, <S%H935><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> is near, <S%H7138><s%> a day of tumult, <S%H4103><s%> and not of joyful shouting, <S%H1906><s%> on the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>

Now will I shortly <S%H7138><s%> pour out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> on you, <S%H3615><s%> and accomplish my anger <S%H639><s%> against you, <S%H8199><s%> and will judge you according to your ways; <S%H1870><s%> and I will bring <S%H5414><s%> on you all your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

My eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare, <S%H2347><s%> neither will I have pity: <S%H2550><s%> I will bring <S%H5414><s%> on you according to your ways; <S%H1870><s%> and your abominations <S%H8441><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you; <S%H3045><s%> and you shall know that I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, do strike. <S%H5221><s%>

Behold, <S%H3117><s%> the day, behold, <S%H935><s%> it comes: your doom <S%H6843><s%> is gone forth; <S%H3318><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> has blossomed, <S%H6692><s%> pride <S%H2087><s%> has budded. <S%H6524><s%>

Violence <S%H2555><s%> has risen up <S%H6965><s%> into a rod <S%H4294><s%> of wickedness. <S%H7562><s%> None of them shall remain, <S%H1995><s%> nor of their multitude, nor of their wealth. <S%H1991><s%> There shall be nothing of value among them. <S%H5089><s%>

The time <S%H6256><s%> has come, <S%H935><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> draws near: <S%H5060><s%> don't <S%H7069><s%> let the buyer rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> nor the seller <S%H4376><s%> mourn; <S%H56><s%> for wrath <S%H2740><s%> is on all its multitude. <S%H1995><s%>

For the seller <S%H4376><s%> shall not return <S%H7725><s%> to that which is sold, <S%H4465><s%> although they be yet alive: <S%H2416><s%> for the vision <S%H2377><s%> is touching the whole multitude <S%H1995><s%> of it, <S%H7725><s%> none shall return; neither shall any <S%H376><s%> strengthen <S%H2388><s%> himself in the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his life. <S%H2416><s%>

They have blown <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet, <S%H8619><s%> and have made all ready; <S%H3559><s%> but none goes <S%H1980><s%> to the battle; <S%H4421><s%> for my wrath <S%H2740><s%> is on all its multitude. <S%H1995><s%>

The sword <S%H2719><s%> is outside, <S%H2351><s%> and the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and the famine <S%H7458><s%> within: <S%H1004><s%> he who is in the field <S%H7704><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> with the sword: <S%H2719><s%> and he who is in the city, <S%H5892><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> and pestilence <S%H1698><s%> shall devour him. <S%H398><s%>

But those of those who escape <S%H6403><s%> shall escape, <S%H6412><s%> and shall be on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> like doves <S%H3123><s%> of the valleys, <S%H1516><s%> all of them moaning, <S%H1993><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> in his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
All hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be feeble, <S%H7503><s%> and all knees <S%H1290><s%> shall be weak <S%H3212><s%> as water. <S%H4325><s%>

They shall also clothe <S%H2296><s%> themselves with sackcloth, <S%H8242><s%> and horror <S%H6427><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> them; <S%H955><s%> and shame shall be on all faces, <S%H6440><s%> and baldness <S%H7144><s%> on all their heads. <S%H7218><s%>

They shall cast <S%H7993><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> in the streets, <S%H2351><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall be as an unclean <S%H5079><s%> thing; <S%H3701><s%> their silver and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall not be able <S%H3201><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the wrath <S%H5678><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> they shall not satisfy <S%H7646><s%> their souls, <S%H5315><s%> neither fill <S%H4390><s%> their bowels; <S%H4578><s%> because it has been the stumbling block <S%H4383><s%> of their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

As for the beauty <S%H6643><s%> of his ornament, <S%H5716><s%> he set <S%H7760><s%> it in majesty; <S%H1347><s%> but they made <S%H6213><s%> the images <S%H6754><s%> of their abominations <S%H8441><s%> and their detestable things <S%H8251><s%> therein: <S%H5414><s%> therefore have I made it to them as an unclean thing. <S%H5079><s%>

I will give <S%H5414><s%> it into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the strangers <S%H2114><s%> for a prey, <S%H957><s%> and to the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for a spoil; <S%H7998><s%> and they shall profane it. <S%H2490><s%>

My face <S%H6440><s%> will I turn <S%H5437><s%> also from them, <S%H2490><s%> and they shall profane my secret <S%H6845><s%> place; <S%H6530><s%> and robbers shall enter <S%H935><s%> into it, <S%H2490><s%> and profane it.

Make <S%H6213><s%> the chain; <S%H7569><s%> for the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of bloody <S%H1818><s%> crimes, <S%H4941><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of violence. <S%H2555><s%>

Therefore I will bring <S%H935><s%> the worst <S%H7451><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> their houses: <S%H1004><s%> I will also make the pride <S%H1347><s%> of the strong <S%H5794><s%> to cease; <S%H7673><s%> and their holy places <S%H6942><s%> shall be profaned. <S%H2490><s%>
Destruction <S%H7089><s%> comes; <S%H935><s%> and they shall seek <S%H1245><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> and there shall be none.

Mischief <S%H1943><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on mischief, <S%H1943><s%> and rumor <S%H8052><s%> shall be on rumor; <S%H8052><s%> and they shall seek <S%H1245><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> of the prophet; <S%H5030><s%> but the law <S%H8451><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> from the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and counsel <S%H6098><s%> from the elders. <S%H2205><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> shall mourn, <S%H56><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with desolation, <S%H8077><s%> and the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall be troubled: <S%H926><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> to them after their way, <S%H1870><s%> and according to their own judgments <S%H4941><s%> will I judge <S%H8199><s%> them; <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
